room_title: Escape room "Dead Zone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: The room was thrilling! Staff was polite and helpful! Faith was amazing! We will definitely go back! The facility was clean and well maintained.

room_title: Escape room "Dead Zone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: We had a group of 4 and decided to try the newest room “Dead Zone”. We had an absolute blast! It was a total rush of adrenaline the entire 60 minutes. The clues were extremely well thought out and very clever. Kudos to the designer!We barley escaped and can not wait to come back! 10/10 would recommend. We’ve been to other well known escape games and we were all in agreement that Trapped has been our favorite! Considering the staff, design, decor, clues, and difficulty...not sure this place can be topped!

room_title: Escape room "Dead Zone" by Trapped Escape Game in Nashville
review: Asylum is a great escape game. We barely escaped! One friend and I also did dead zone.... Both were definitely a lot of fun!
